nodes.text: This green tusked pirate was a member of Lemo and Sanda's gang a short time after the Battle of Endor. He was tasked with keeping watch on Han Solo and Chewbacca after they had been placed in energy binders. Alone with the two prisoners, the pirate tried to convince Solo to help him find the Dancing Goddess and bypass the other gang members altogether. However, Solo had no idea where the Dancing Goddess was, and he refused the pirate's deal.

To escape their imprisonment, Chewbacca feigned an injury, and Solo was able to get his legs around the pirate's throat. The tusked pirate was forced to release Solo and Chewbacca, and as soon as they had been freed, they put the pirate into the binders and left to go rescue Lando Calrissian, whom the other gang members had gone to capture.
